description: Creates a collection in an AWS Region. You can add faces to the collection using the  IndexFaces operation. For example, you might create collections, one for each of your application users. A user can then index faces using the IndexFaces operation and persist results in a specific collection. Then, a user can search the collection for faces in the user-specific container. When you create a collection, it is associated with the latest version of the face model version. This operation requires permissions to perform the rekognition:CreateCollection action. If you want to tag your collection, you also require permission to perform the rekognition:TagResource operation.

parameters.name: CollectionId
parameters.description: ID for the collection that you are creating.

parameters.name: Tags
parameters.description: A set of tags (key-value pairs) that you want to attach to the collection. (string) --- (string) ---

nested_items.name: StatusCode
nested_items.description: HTTP status code indicating the result of the operation.

nested_items.name: CollectionArn
nested_items.description: Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the collection. You can use this to manage permissions on your resources.

nested_items.name: FaceModelVersion
nested_items.description: Version number of the face detection model associated with the collection you are creating.
